item.title: Booking the Lab
item.description: Booking the Lab # Learn how to reserve space in the Beta Lab. IMPORTANT: If you plan to reserve tools, materials or storage you must reserve through Bert. Book Through Google Calendar # There are three distinct Google Calendars for each area of the lab: Classroom Area Power Tool Area Machine Shop Clicking the links above will add them to your Google Calendar where you can view their upcoming and past events.
